price: Wọ́n mọ ìdẹ̀ra Allāhu, lẹ́yìn náà wọ́n ń takò ó. Ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ wọn sì ni aláìmoore.
arabic: يَعۡرِفُونَ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنكِرُونَهَا وَأَكۡثَرُهُمُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yaʿrifūna niʿ'mata al-lahi thumma yunkirūnahā wa-aktharuhumu al-kāfirūna
